name: Sonja
description:
Created for the Game Makers Iceland Game Jam Sonja is a 2D platformer where you play as Sonja the vampire. Sonja has decided that she only eats animals that have died from natural causes, she just awoke from a long slumber and she is famished. Use your cloud powers to block the sun but watch out the more you block it the more aggressive the local becomes. (Since Vitamin D deficiency).

On your adventures through the forest something bad is lurking and now Sonja must save the world.

This was a game jam game so bugs are very likely to appear.
We would also love to hear your feedback on the game Game play, setting or story wise.

Controls:
Movement: A/D or Left/Right
Jump: W or Space
Cloud Powers: J
Vampire Dash: K
